languages.text: Creates a 3×3 toxic zone which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Every round, everyone within and every creature entering the zone suffers 6 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. Creatures within the zone must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} every round or also suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6) effect.
languages.original_text: Создает токсичную область 3×3 на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Каждый раунд все существа, находящиеся внутри или перемещающиеся в эту зону, получают 6 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичного урона{/g}. Цели в области действия раз в раунд выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала также получают {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g} (6).

traits.locale_text: Creates a 3×3 toxic zone which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Every round, everyone within and every creature entering the zone suffers damage. Creatures within the zone must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} every round or suffer toxin.

Creates a 3×3 toxic zone which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Every round, everyone within and every creature entering the zone suffers 6 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. Creatures within the zone must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} every round or also suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6) effect.

languages.text: Создает токсичную область 3×3 на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Каждый раунд все существа, находящиеся внутри или перемещающиеся в эту зону, получают 6 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичного урона{/g}. Цели в области действия раз в раунд выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала также получают {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g} (6).

Erzeugt eine Giftzone von 3×3 Feldern, die für 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} Bestand hat. Jeder innerhalb dieser Zone und jede Kreatur, die diese Zone betritt, erleidet 6 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g}. Kreaturen innerhalb der Zone müssen jede Runde eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen, sonst erleiden sie auch den Effekt {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} (6).
languages.original_text: Creates a 3×3 toxic zone which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Every round, everyone within and every creature entering the zone suffers 6 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. Creatures within the zone must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} every round or also suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6) effect.

traits.locale_text: Erzeugt eine Giftzone von 3×3 Feldern um das Ziel herum, die für 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} Bestand hat. Das Ziel führt eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} durch. Scheitert diese, wird das Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g}.

languages.text: Crée une zone toxique de 3 × 3 qui dure 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. À chaque round, tous les personnages présents dans la zone et toutes les créatures qui y pénètrent subissent 6 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g}. Les créatures présentes dans la zone doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} à chaque round, faute de quoi elles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} (6).
languages.original_text: Creates a 3×3 toxic zone which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Every round, everyone within and every creature entering the zone suffers 6 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. Creatures within the zone must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} every round or also suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6) effect.

traits.locale_text: Crée sous la cible une zone toxique de 3 × 3 qui dure 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. La cible passe un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g}. Si elle échoue, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}.

languages.text: 在目标脚下创建一片3×3毒性区域，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。每轮中，所有处于区域内与进入该区域的所有生物都会受到6点{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}。区域内的生物每轮都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，如果目标未能通过检定，则同样会受到{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}（6）效果影响。
languages.original_text: Creates a 3×3 toxic zone which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Every round, everyone within and every creature entering the zone suffers 6 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. Creatures within the zone must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} every round or also suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6) effect.

traits.locale_text: 在目标脚下创建一片3×3毒性区域，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。如果目标未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}俯卧{/g}状态。

languages.text: Crea una zona tóxica de 3×3 bajo el objetivo que dura 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Cada asalto, cualquier criatura que esté dentro o entre sufre 6 de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}daño tóxico{/g}. Las criaturas en la zona deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} cada asalto o sufrir además el efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} (6).
languages.original_text: Creates a 3×3 toxic zone which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Every round, everyone within and every creature entering the zone suffers 6 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. Creatures within the zone must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} every round or also suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6) effect.

traits.locale_text: Crea una zona tóxica de 3×3 bajo el objetivo que dura 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. El objetivo realiza una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}. Si falla, el objetivo queda {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g}.

languages.text: 2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}持続する3x3の猛毒地帯を作り出す。毎ラウンド、その範囲内にいる全員が6{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒性ダメージ{/g}を受ける。範囲内の生物は毎ラウンド{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行い、また失敗すると(6){g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}状態となる。
languages.original_text: Creates a 3×3 toxic zone which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Every round, everyone within and every creature entering the zone suffers 6 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. Creatures within the zone must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} every round or also suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6) effect.

traits.locale_text: 2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、ターゲットの下に3×3の毒のゾーンを作り出す。ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を行う。失敗した場合、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態になる。.
